abilities.name: Implode
abilities.hint: One adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage:3% (plus modifier) and gain Disadvantage on all its attack until the end of its next turn.
abilities.bottomHint: Move up to 2 hexes away, then place a destruction token on one obstacle within 3 hexes. It is now considered a normal hex.

bottomActions.value: Destroy one obstacle within %game.action.range:2%

abilities.name: Knock Out the Support
abilities.bottomHint: <small>Gain Advantage on all your attacks until the end of your next turn.</small>

bottomActions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, perform

abilities.name: Piston Punch
abilities.bottomHint: One adjacent enemy cannot perform any actions until the end of its next turn.

bottomActions.value: stun

abilities.name: Explosive Blitz
abilities.hint: One enemy within 4 hexes suffers %game.damage:2% (plus modifier—Disadvantage if adjacent).

abilities.name: The Big One
abilities.hint: Up to two enemies within 2 hexes suffer %game.damage:2% (plus a separate modifier for each—Disadvantage if adjacent).

abilities.name: One-Two Punch
abilities.hint: One adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage:2% (plus modifier), then the same or a different adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage:1% (plus modifier).

abilities.name: The Big One
abilities.hint: <small>All enemies in the targeted area suffer %game.damage:3% (plus a separate modifier for each—Disadvantage if adjacent) and lose this card.</small>
abilities.bottomHint: Move up to 3 hexes away, then one adjacent enemy is moved 1 hex away from you.

abilities.name: One-Two Punch
abilities.bottomHint: One adjacent enemy suffers %game.damage:1% (plus modifier), then collect all money tokens and treasure tiles in or adjacent to your hex.

subActions.value: Add %game.action.push:2% and %game.condition.muddle% if this attack targets the same enemy as the previous Attack ability.

actions.value: On your next two attacks, add +2 %game.action.attack%.

bottomActions.value: Double the value of your next Move ability.

subActions.value: Add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if the target is adjacent to a wall.

bottomActions.value: One adjacent enemy that is adjacent to a wall suffers %game.damage:2%.

subActions.value: All heals targeting the target have no effect this round. To signify this, place one of your character tokens on the target.

bottomActions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:1% and perform

actions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:2% and perform

subActions.value: Target all enemies adjacent to the destroyed obstacle

bottomActions.value: Destroy one obstacle within %game.action.range:3%.

Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:1% and perform

subActions.value: Add %game.action.push:2%, %game.condition.muddle% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if this attack targets the same enemy as the previous Attack ability.

actions.value: Designate one hex within %game.action.range:3% containing a destruction token. All allies and enemies in or adjacent to that hex suffer %game.damage:2%.

bottomActions.value: Create one 2-damage trap in an adjacent empty hex containing a destruction token.

subActions.value: Add +3 %game.action.attack% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if the target is an objective.

bottomActions.value: Add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your melee attacks this round.
round

actions.value: Create one 3-damage %game.condition.muddle% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.

bottomActions.value: Designate one adjacent enemy. If each hex of the movement brought you closer to that enemy, perform

subActions.value: <small>targeting that enemy, where X is the number of hexes you moved.<small>
This movement is unaffected by difficult terrain.

actions.value: On your next four attacks targeting enemies adjacent to a wall, add +2 %game.action.attack%.

subActions.value: Each time you enter a hex containing an obstacle with this movement, destroy that obstacle and add +1 %game.action.move%.

bottomActions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:1% and all enemies adjacent to the destroyed obstacle suffer %game.damage:2%.

subActions.value: Add +1 %game.action.attack% for each wall hex, obstacle hex, objective, figure, or trap adjacent to the target.

bottomActions.value: Move one adjacent trap to an enemy hex adjacent to you.

actions.value: Destroy one obstacle within %game.action.range:4%. If you do, perform

subActions.value: Target all enemies adjacent to the destroyed obstacle

bottomActions.value: Create three 3-damage traps in an empty hex within %game.action.range:4%.

subActions.value: Add +2 %game.action.attack%, %game.condition.wound% and gain %game.card.experience:1% if the target is adjacent to a wall.

bottomActions.value: fire

actions.value: Your maximum hit point value is increased by 5.

bottomActions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:1% and perform

subActions.value: <small>Ignore the Shield value of the target, add %game.condition.poison%, and gain %game.card.experience:1% if this attack targets the same enemy as the previous two Attack abilities.</small>

bottomActions.value: Place one of your character tokens on one adjacent normal or elite enemy. You and all allies may ignore the Shield value of this enemy this round.
All objectives within %game.action.range:3% suffer %game.damage:3%.

actions.value: <small>On your next three attacks targeting enemies you attacked earlier in the same round, add +3 %game.action.attack%.</small>

bottomActions.value: Add %game.condition.immobilize% to all your attacks this round.

subActions.value: Destroy all obstacles in the targeted area. All allies in the targeted area suffer %game.damage:2%.

bottomActions.value: All adjacent enemies that are adjacent to a wall suffer %game.damage:2%.

actions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle or objective. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:1% and perform

subActions.value: Target all enemies adjacent to the destroyed obstacle or objective

bottomActions.value: Destroy one adjacent obstacle. If you do, gain %game.card.experience:1% and all enemies in the same room as the destroyed obstacle suffer %game.damage:2%.
You may perform any destroy obstacle ability as if one empty hex within range of the ability contains an obstacle. If you do, do not place a destruction token.
